attributes.action: publicly recognise it is in the best interests of viewers for Strictly Come Dancing and X Factor to be screened at different times; asks him to support The People's Let's Fix It campaign; and to use his influence to urge the BBC to sit down with ITV to work out a compromise that will allow fans to watch both shows live on Saturday night.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
